colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI RIM PA DANG PO'I LAM LA SLOB PA'I TSUL BSKYED RIM GSAL BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN MANG POS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS RANG NYID KYI SLOB BU 'GA' LA ZIN THUN DU STZAL BA LA GZHI BYAS, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI GZUGS BRNYAN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I DPAL GYIS 'CHI MED BKOD PAR BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA YON TAN MCHOG GIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
